text: We must not be content to memorize the beautiful formulas of our illustrious predecessors. Let us go out and study beautiful nature.
author: Paul Cezanne

text: I lack the magnificent richness of color that animates nature.
author: Paul Cezanne

text: There are unknown forces in nature when we give ourselves wholly to her, without reserve, she lends them to us she shows us these forms, which our watching eyes do not see, which our intelligence does not understand or suspect.
author: Auguste Rodin

text: The duty of man is the same in respect to his own nature as in respect to the nature of all other things, namely not to follow it but to amend it.
author: John Stuart Mill

text: Beauty is the first present nature gives to women and the first it takes away.
author: Fay Weldon
